Slouch Vest and Bandeau Top - Hidden Leopard
kDesc
The sun is out at Lockwood HQ so we thought you'd love to give this summery garment to someone who brightens your day! [#Legal]
Le soleil est de sortie au QG Lockwood alors nous avons pensé que vous adoreriez offrir ce vêtement d'été à quelqu'un qui illumine votre journée ! [#Legal]
Die Sonne scheint über dem Lockwood Hauptquartier, daher dachten wir, du möchtest dieses sommerliche Outfit gerne jemandem schenken, der dir den Tag erhellt. [#Legal]
Il sole splende nel QG di Lockwood e siamo sicuri che impazzirai per questo capo estivo che illumina la tua giornata! [#Legal]
El sol ha salido en la sede de Lockwood, así que hemos pensado que seguro que te encantaría regalarle esta prenda veraniega a esa persona que te alegra el día. [#Legal]
The sun is out at Lockwood HQ so we thought you'd love to give this summery garment to someone who brightens your day! [#Legal]
Lockwood 본부에 비추는 햇빛이 좋아서, 당신에게 밝음을 선사하는 그 누군가에게 이 여름 의상을 선물하고 싶을 거란 생각이 들었습니다! [#Legal]
The sun is out at Lockwood HQ so we thought you'd love to give this summery garment to someone who brightens your day! [#Legal]
Lockwood總部放晴天了！各位也會想贈送這套夏裝給您的陽光人物吧！ [#Legal]
Lockwood總部放晴天了！各位也會想贈送這套夏裝給您的陽光人物吧！ [#Legal]
The sun is out at Lockwood HQ so we thought you'd love to give this summery garment to someone who brightens your day! [#Legal]
